features: ✅Moisturizes hair: Argan oil is rich in vitamins, antioxidants, and essential fatty acids, which moisturize the hair and scalp, preventing dryness and split ends.
✅Adds shine: Xpel Argan Oil Hair Treatment helps to smooth down the hair cuticle, reducing frizz and adding shine.
✅Protects hair: The product helps to protect your hair from environmental stressors, such as UV rays and heat styling tools, by forming a protective layer around the hair shaft.
✅Improves hair elasticity: The essential fatty acids in argan oil help to improve hair elasticity, making it less prone to breakage.
✅Strengthens hair: Xpel Argan Oil Hair Treatment contains natural ingredients that strengthen the hair and protect it from damage, leaving your hair stronger and healthier.
description: Product Description Argan Oil Hair Treatment 100ml Ingredients Argan oil , Cyclopentasiloxane , Dimethiconol , Cyclotetrasiloxane , Isopropyl Myristate Directions Apply to damp or dry hair to nourish and rejuvenate dry and damaged hair.
